name: tramboory
description: AplicaciÃ³n completa de Tramboory con backend y frontend

scripts.start: concurrently "cd app && npm start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd app && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.install-all: npm install && concurrently "cd app && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
